title: How to easily get notifications for all folders?
creator: bear
content:
Hello,

I want to get notifications of new mails for ALL folders of my 2 mail accounts without having to set the notification setting in every folder. Is this possible? I don't need push notifications for all folders, just notifications, even if they are only checked every 15m. For folders where I need push notifications, I have set it up separately.

Thank you very much in advance.

title: I tried exporting from the desktop with a scan QR but all I see is an empty outbox folder
